Feature.Name: Major Property
Feature.Text: Each time you become attuned to the artifact, you age 3d10 years. You must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or die from the shock. If you die, you are instantly transformed into a wight (see the Monster Manual) under the DM 's control that is sworn to protect the artifact.
